divs: sighting detailsi was at home laying in bed watching a movie. i sometimes suffer from insomnia and i had hoped i could doze off while watching a late night horror film. anyways, at some time around 5:45 am i noticed a very bright light moving across the sky. i observed it from my bedroom window which is right next to my bed. at first i thought it was a low flying plane but as i watched it i knew this was not the case. my window looks out into my backyard where there is a barn and beyond that is forest for about a mile or so. there were no other blinking lights that are usually associated with regular aircraft. the thing that made it very odd was the fact that as it moved in a north\north east direction away from my home, it seemed to float or bob like a balloon in the wind but not as violent. it seemed to be controlled but flew in a somewhat erratic motion. it did not seem to go off its straight course but only moved up and down as it went. i opened my window (it was cold out but what the heck right?) and i could hear no sounds except the wind. the area around my home is mostly forest and if i held out my arm and was holding a shirt button, it would cover it. it seemed to slow down and speed up at times, a few times nearly coming to a stop and then it continued on as usual. it seemed to be at least as high above the trees as a low flying plane. i made sure not to jump to conclusions and rule out other possibilities. after i lost sight of it, due to simply being out of viewing range, i realized that i had the closest encounter with a ufo in my life so far. i was excited about it and i wished i happened to have a pair of binnoculars handy or even a video camera handy. like i said, it was a bright light and was flickering like a star. its main colors seemed to be white,yellow and orange. it did seem a little hazy around the object but the light itself was crystal clear. i have seen many planes fly over my house and i can swear on anything that this was the real thing. i tried to look as close as i could at it to see if maybe there was more to it than the light i was seeing but i could not make out any discernable details other than what i have already described. it was spherical and as bright as a star. i would judge and say that the object must have been a little more than 800 feet from my house, which would make the object somewhat smaller than a plane i suppose? it was not really big as far as i could tell. it was just a bright bobbing light that drifted past my house and was heading to who knows where? my brothers who also live in my home have seen strange lights around 2:00 am on an almost regular basis but this is my personal first experience. i can only hope others may have spotted it and come forward as well. my name is jason and i am 24 years old and i swear on my life that what i have written is the truth and nothing but the truth so help me god! i just recently moved to maine and i have been coming to go camping up here for years when i lived in nh. this is one the most profound experiences of my life. i would also like to add that i was not dozing off as i had hoped i would (the film proved to be interesting) and i was not in a hypnogogic state. what i saw was real and not an insomnia induced illusion. i became very excited after the sighting and immediately came to mufon to write a report asap while all the details were fresh in my mind.
Summary: Saw bright light head in a North/North East direction behind my house and almost seemed to be floating or bobbing through the sky for several mins before vanishing from view.
